title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Tesla’s retro-futuristic diner officially opens as Elon Musk hints at more locations
items.description: The Tesla Diner & Drive-In officially opened Monday and it seems Elon Musk is planning for more.

items.title: OpenAI and Google outdo the mathletes, but not each other
items.description: OpenAI and Google's AI models achieved impressive results in a difficult math competition, but disputed how the other got their score.

items.title: OpenAI's New CEO of Applications Strikes Hyper-Optimistic Tone in First Memo to Staff
items.description: Soon-to-be former Instacart CEO Fidji Simo sent a memo to OpenAI staff Monday laying out her vision for how AI will change the world.

items.title: ChatGPT users send 2.5 billion prompts a day
items.description: ChatGPT receives 2.5 billion prompts from global users every day.

items.title: What’s Behind Gen Z’s Sex Recession?
items.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, author Carter Sherman breaks down the forces shaping Gen Z's unique relationship to sex.

items.title: Hackers exploiting SharePoint zero-day seen targeting government agencies
items.description: Thousands of SharePoint servers could be vulnerable to hackers, according to cybersecurity firms.
